name: fob
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also key fob) a piece of leather or other material to which a group of keys is fastened: There are big fobs on hotel keys so guests don't take them home.
Dave King/Dorling Kindersley/GettyImages
(also key fob) an electronic device connected to a key that is used to lock and unlock a car's doors or operate a piece of equipment: Access is controlled by means of a fob.
Jeffoto/E+/GettyImages
a chain or piece of material used, especially in the past, to fasten a watch to a man's waistcoat: He wore a waistcoat complete with a pocket watch on a fob.
SEAN GLADWELL/Moment/GettyImages
